title: Setup Infrastructure and DevOps Pipelines
description: Establish cloud infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, environment segregation (dev, stage, prod), secrets management, and monitoring dashboards to support all downstream development.
acceptance_criteria: Infrastructure deployed via IaC with separate environments
CI/CD pipelines operational with automated tests and rollback
Secrets managed securely with rotation
Monitoring dashboards live with alerts

title: Implement Core Data Models and Event Contracts
description: Define and implement core data models for users, service profiles, studios, bookings, payments, messaging, and events with strict schema validation and versioning.
acceptance_criteria: Core data models implemented with cascade deletes and constraints
Event contracts defined with JSON schema and CI validation
Versioning and backward compatibility enforced
Data privacy and PII masking enforced

title: Develop Authentication and Authorization System
description: Implement user authentication with email, Apple, Google, optional SMS MFA, session management, device trust, and RBAC for admin and user roles.
acceptance_criteria: Support for email, Apple, Google sign-in
MFA optional except for sensitive actions
Session management with secure cookies
RBAC enforced with JIT elevation for admin

title: Implement Role-Based Service Profiles and Onboarding Wizard
description: Build multi-role user profiles with role-specific fields, packages, pricing, availability, and onboarding wizards enforcing completeness and Safe-Mode compliance.
acceptance_criteria: Multi-role profiles with editable fields and packages
Onboarding wizard with step gating and autosave
Safe-Mode enforced on media uploads
Completeness scoring gating Instant Book eligibility

title: Build Search Infrastructure and APIs
description: Develop search indices for people and studios with role-specific filters, Safe-Mode filtering, ranking algorithms, promotions integration, and GraphQL search APIs.
acceptance_criteria: Search indices updated within 5 minutes of data changes
Role and Safe-Mode aware filters and facets
Ranking with reputation, availability, price fit, and promotions
GraphQL APIs with pagination and error handling

title: Develop Search UI and Saved Searches
description: Implement frontend search UI with role tabs, filters, saved searches with alerts, autocomplete, and Safe-Mode toggles.
acceptance_criteria: Search UI with role tabs and filters
Saved searches with daily alerts and pause option
Autocomplete with typo tolerance and Safe-Mode
Safe-Mode toggle default ON for guests

title: Implement Booking and Checkout Core Services
description: Build booking domain with linked booking groups (LBG), calendar holds, contract auto-attachment, escrowed payments, atomic confirmation, and payment provider integration.
acceptance_criteria: Booking state machine with LBG support
Atomic booking confirmation with escrowed payments
Contract packs generated and e-signed before payment
Calendar holds and conflict detection

title: Build Booking and Checkout Frontend
description: Implement booking widget enforcing min hours, buffers, crew size, deposits, cancellation policies, and checkout flow with payment methods and document signing.
acceptance_criteria: Booking widget with pricing breakdown and policy display
Checkout supporting card, ACH, and deposit auth
Document signing gating payment
Cancellation and refund policies enforced

title: Implement Messaging and Inbox System
description: Develop role- and booking-aware messaging threads with message requests gating, action cards for booking management, attachments with virus and NSFW scanning, read receipts, typing indicators, and Safe-Mode enforcement.
acceptance_criteria: Messaging threads with role and booking context
Message requests with accept/decline/block
Action cards with domain workflows
Attachment upload with AV and NSFW scanning
Safe-Mode enforced on previews

title: Build Messaging UI and Notifications
description: Implement inbox with folders, filters, search, message composer with attachments and action cards, notifications with quiet hours, digests with ICS calendar attachments, and Safe-Mode toggles.
acceptance_criteria: Inbox with folders and filters
Message composer supporting attachments and cards
Notifications respecting quiet hours and preferences
Safe-Mode toggle default ON

title: Implement Smart Docs CMS and E-Signature Integration
description: Develop versioned clause library, document templates, pack generation with variable binding, PDF hashing and storage, e-signature envelope management with webhook handling, and admin console with audit and dual approval.
acceptance_criteria: Versioned clause library with city/role gating
Document pack generation blocking payment until signed
Immutable PDF storage with SHA-256 hashes
E-signature envelope lifecycle with webhook events
Admin console with audit logs and two-person approval

title: Build Smart Docs UI and Admin Tools
description: Implement document viewing, signing prompts, re-issue flows, admin management of clauses, templates, packs, and audit logs with dual approval for money/safety/legal-impacting changes.
acceptance_criteria: User document viewing and signing flows
Admin clause/template/pack management
Audit logs with immutable records
Dual approval enforced for sensitive changes

title: Implement Trust & Safety Verification Stack
description: Build ID verification with liveness, background checks with FCRA compliance, social verification via OAuth, risk scoring, badge issuance, adverse action workflows, and admin consoles with audit and dual approval.
acceptance_criteria: IDV with 18+ gating unlocking Instant Book
Background checks with opt-in and adverse action
Social verification syncing nightly with manual refresh
Risk scoring and payout holds
Admin consoles with audit and two-person approval

title: Build Verification UI and User Flows
description: Implement user flows for IDV, background check consent, social account linking, badge display, and admin review queues with audit logs and dual approval for overrides.
acceptance_criteria: User IDV and background check consent flows
Social account OAuth linking and badge display
Admin review queues with audit trails
Dual approval for sensitive overrides

title: Implement Payments and Escrow System
description: Integrate Stripe Connect for card and ACH payments with escrow-like capture, payout scheduling with reserves and early payout options, refunds with time-banded policies, chargeback handling with evidence, and ledger accounting.
acceptance_criteria: Stripe Connect integration with card and ACH
Escrow capture and delayed payouts with reserves
Refund kernel enforcing cancellation policies
Chargeback evidence and dispute lifecycle
Double-entry ledger with reconciliation

title: Build Payments UI and Admin Console
description: Implement checkout UI supporting multiple payment methods, refund and dispute management, payout scheduling, and admin finance console with audit and two-person approval for money moves.
acceptance_criteria: Checkout supporting card, ACH, and escrow
Refund and dispute management UI
Payout scheduling and reserve controls
Admin console with audit and dual approval

title: Implement Studio Marketplace Backend
description: Develop studio data model with amenities, pricing, availability, verification, deposit policies, blackout dates, and search indexing with Safe-Mode filtering and atomic booking holds.
acceptance_criteria: Studio data model with detailed fields and constraints
Verification gating and deposit policy enforcement
Availability with buffers, blackouts, and ICS support
Safe-Mode filtering and search indexing
Atomic booking holds and conflict detection

title: Build Studio Marketplace UI and Admin Tools
description: Implement studio listing pages, booking widgets with deposit holds, host wizards, dashboards with calendar and post-booking adjustments, verification queue, and admin policy editors with audit logs.
acceptance_criteria: Studio public pages with amenities and SFW media
Booking widget enforcing policies and deposits
Host dashboard with calendar and adjustments
Verification queue with audit and dual approval
Admin policy editors with immutable logs

title: Implement Portfolio and Boards System
description: Develop portfolio items with collaborator tagging, media uploads with Safe-Mode enforcement, boards supporting mixed content, case studies with request similar shoot CTA, and DMCA reporting.
acceptance_criteria: Portfolio items with approved collaborator tags
Media uploads with virus and NSFW scanning
Boards supporting mixed content and sharing
Case studies with RFP prefill
DMCA reporting and admin review

title: Build Portfolio and Boards UI
description: Implement portfolio editor, media uploader with cropping, boards creation and management, case study pages, Safe-Mode enforcement, and DMCA report UI.
acceptance_criteria: Portfolio editing with collaborator management
Media upload with Safe-Mode and moderation
Boards with add/remove and sharing features
Case study pages with studio linking
DMCA report submission UI

title: Implement Help Center and Support Ticketing
description: Build Help Center with categorized articles, search, guided troubleshooters, ticket intake with typed cases, evidence stitching, macros, SLA timers, and audit logs.
acceptance_criteria: Help Center with categories and search
Guided troubleshooters opening typed cases
Ticketing with evidence-first timelines
Macros and SLA timers with audit
Immutable logs and role-based access

title: Build Help Center UI and Support Console
description: Implement Help Center frontend with article rendering, search, feedback, guided flows, and Support Console with case management, macros, and audit trails.
acceptance_criteria: Help Center with accessible article pages
Search with filters and noindex internal content
Support Console with case queues and macros
Audit logs for all actions
SLA timer alerts and notifications

title: Implement Promotions and Boosting System
description: Develop promotions campaigns with CPC floors, density caps, eligibility rules, quality score ranking, fraud detection, budget pacing, billing integration, and admin dashboards.
acceptance_criteria: Campaign creation with city/role targeting
CPC floors and density caps enforced
Quality score based ranking with fraud controls
Budget pacing and auto-pause on exhaustion
Billing integration with make-good credits

title: Build Promotions UI and Admin Tools
description: Implement seller-facing boost setup wizard, bid suggestions, quality score checklist, campaign management UI, fraud monitoring, and billing dashboards with alerts.
acceptance_criteria: Boost setup wizard with bid guidance
Campaign management with status and budgets
Fraud detection alerts and auto-pausing
Billing dashboards with spend and credits
Dual approval for money-impacting changes

title: Implement Reputation and Reviews System
description: Build role- and space-scoped reviews with double-blind submission, fraud detection, weighted reputation scores, moderation queues, appeals, and verified booking enforcement.
acceptance_criteria: One review per completed booking leg
Double-blind review process with 14-day window
Fraud heuristics blocking self-reviews and rings
Weighted reputation scores with decay
Moderation and appeals with audit logs

title: Build Reviews UI and Moderation Console
description: Implement review submission and editing UI, display of reputation scores and verified badges, moderation queue with hide/remove/restore, and owner reply with limits.
acceptance_criteria: Review submission with eligibility checks
Display reputation and verified badges
Moderation queue with audit and appeals
Owner reply with rate limits
Safe-Mode enforced on media

title: Implement Analytics and Experimentation Platform
description: Build event ingestion pipeline with Bronze/Silver/Gold layers, schema validation, data quality gates, privacy enforcement, CUPED and SRM guardrails, and dashboards for KPIs and anomaly alerts.
acceptance_criteria: Event ingestion with schema validation and DLQ
Data quality tests with quarantine and alerts
Privacy enforcement with PII masking and DSAR
Experiment framework with CUPED and SRM
Dashboards with KPIs and anomaly detection

title: Build Analytics Dashboards and Experimentation UI
description: Implement dashboards for marketplace health, growth, trust, finance, and support; experiment management UI with preregistration, guardrails, and reporting; and alerting for anomalies and SLA breaches.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboards displaying key KPIs with drilldowns
Experiment preregistration and guardrail enforcement
Alerting on KPI anomalies and SLA breaches
Role-based access to analytics and experiment data

title: Implement Admin Console and Security Controls
description: Develop admin console with RBAC, SSO, just-in-time elevation, immutable audit logs, dual approval workflows, case and user management, feature flag management, and security monitoring integrations.
acceptance_criteria: Admin console with role-based access and SSO
JIT elevation and two-person approval enforced
Immutable audit logs with WORM storage
Case and user management with audit trails
Feature flag management with rollback and blast radius

title: Build Admin UI and Operational Workflows
description: Implement admin UI for case queues, user suspension, refunds, payouts, search curation, smart docs management, content moderation, and feature flag controls with audit and dual approval.
acceptance_criteria: Admin UI supports all operational workflows
Audit logs immutable and accessible
Dual approval enforced for sensitive actions
Feature flags manageable with blast radius notes
Role-based access control enforced

title: Implement Content Moderation and Safety Systems
description: Develop multi-tier content safety scanning (NSFW, OCR PII, virus), automated and human review queues, escalation workflows, Safe-Mode enforcement, harassment and doxxing detection, and admin moderation tools.
acceptance_criteria: Automated NSFW and PII scanning with quarantine
Human review queues with SLA timers
Escalation and appeal workflows
Safe-Mode filtering on public surfaces
Harassment and doxxing detection with admin tools

title: Build Help Center and Support Workflows
description: Implement Help Center with categorized articles, guided flows, ticket intake, evidence stitching, macros, SLA timers, and audit logs; integrate with admin console and notifications.
acceptance_criteria: Help Center with searchable articles and guided flows
Ticketing with typed cases and evidence-first timelines
Macros and SLA timers with audit logs

acceptance_criteria: Accurate finance ledger with double-entry accounting
Tax calculation per jurisdiction with reporting
Payout scheduling with reserves and early payout options
Refund kernel enforcing cancellation policies
Chargeback lifecycle with evidence and clawbacks

description: Implement finance dashboards for payouts, refunds, reserves, tax reports, and reconciliation; admin UI for refund issuance, payout holds/releases, and variance monitoring with alerts.
acceptance_criteria: Finance dashboards with KPIs and alerts
Admin UI for refund and payout management

title: Implement Communications Platform
description: Build multi-channel communications system supporting email (SES), push (Pinpoint), SMS (SNS/Twilio), and in-app notifications with templated messages, user preferences, quiet hours, batching, deduplication, and compliance.
acceptance_criteria: Multi-channel messaging with templated content
User preference management with quiet hours
Batching and deduplication to prevent spam
Compliance with SPF/DKIM/DMARC and privacy laws

title: Implement Media Upload and Delivery Pipeline
description: Develop chunked, resumable uploads with client-side cropping, EXIF stripping, virus and NSFW scanning, adaptive image/video transcoding, watermarking, proof galleries with expiry, deliverables with licensing, and secure CDN delivery.
acceptance_criteria: Chunked, resumable uploads with presigned URLs
Virus and NSFW scanning with quarantine
Adaptive transcoding and watermarking
Proof galleries with expiry and approval flows

title: Build Media Upload UI and Viewer
description: Implement media upload with cropping and progress, proof gallery UI with approval/revision, deliverables viewer with license info, and Safe-Mode enforcement on previews.
acceptance_criteria: Media upload with client-side cropping and progress
Proof gallery with approval and revision UI
Deliverables viewer showing license and status
Safe-Mode enforced on media previews

title: Implement Calendar and Availability Engine
description: Develop weekly availability rules, exceptions, holds with TTL, ICS calendar sync (read-only MVP), feasibility engine with conflict detection, DST handling, and tokenized ICS feeds.
acceptance_criteria: Weekly rules and exceptions with timezone support
Soft holds with TTL and idempotency
ICS calendar sync with polling and tokenized feeds
Feasibility engine enforcing buffers and conflicts
DST edge cases handled correctly

title: Build Calendar UI and ICS Integration
description: Implement availability editor, calendar views with holds and conflicts, ICS feed subscription UI, and booking feasibility previews with Safe-Mode filtering.
acceptance_criteria: Availability editor with weekly rules and exceptions
Calendar views showing holds and conflicts
ICS feed subscription with token management
Booking feasibility previews with Safe-Mode

title: Implement SEO and Web Performance Infrastructure
description: Develop canonical URL policies, robots.txt, sitemaps, hreflang support, JSON-LD structured data, ISR/SSR caching strategies, Core Web Vitals budgets, accessibility compliance, and SEO monitoring dashboards.
acceptance_criteria: Canonical URLs with 301 redirects and query param stripping
Robots.txt and segmented sitemaps with noindex rules
Hreflang support with locale fallback
JSON-LD for Person, Place, BreadcrumbList, FAQ
ISR/SSR caching with stale-while-revalidate
Core Web Vitals budgets met on mobile
Accessibility WCAG 2.1 AA compliance
SEO monitoring dashboards and alerts

title: Build SEO Pages and Middleware
description: Implement middleware for URL normalization, SEO landing pages for city/role, profiles, studios, and help; structured data injection; sitemap generation; and SEO-safe faceted navigation.
acceptance_criteria: Middleware normalizes URLs with 301 redirects
SEO landing pages with unique copy and stats
Structured data injected per schema.org
Sitemaps generated and submitted
Faceted navigation with noindex on deep filters

title: Implement Mobile Apps and Partner API
description: Develop PWA with offline support, push notifications, deep linking, and media upload; React Native shells with Expo; Partner REST API with OAuth 2.0, rate limits, signed webhooks, and SDKs.
acceptance_criteria: PWA installable with offline and background sync
Push notifications with quiet hours and fallback
Deep linking with web fallback
React Native shells with Expo
Partner REST API with OAuth 2.0 and rate limits
